title: Average ticket price Boston Celtics ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This graph depicts the Average ticket price for Boston Celtics games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 .
In the 2006/07 season , the Average ticket price was 72.96 U.S. dollars .
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Boston Celtics games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16.
In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 57.04 U.S. dollars.
Boston Celtics The Boston Celtics are a professional basketball team of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) playing in the Eastern Conference of the league .
